name: Fullscreen-Button
author: Toni KlÃ¤tke

sections.description:
This plugin enables you to display a Fullscreen Button on your site. The plugin can easy implement with a shortcode. 7 different Versions from the Fullscreen Button are current available.

Usage

Integrate the Shortcode in WordPress and you get the following Unicode Symobol â›¶ with the Full Screen Function. Full customize, for changing the size or color. The â›¶ Unicode Symbol works with the standard HTML text formats.

Update: Now with Support for Font Awesome. With a special Shortcode you get the Font Awesome Expand Icon for Fullscreen Mode.

Shortcodes:

Fullscreen Button (Unicode Symbol â›¶) [fullscreen_button]
Fullscreen Button (Unicode Symbol ðŸ¡¥) [fullscreen_button_2]
Fullscreen Button (Unicode Symbol â†•) [fullscreen_button_3]
Fullscreen Button (Font Awesome) [fullscreen_button_fa]
Fullscreen Button (SVG Alternate) [fullscreen_button_a1]
Fullscreen Button (Text Version) [fullscreen_button_text]
Fullscreen Button (Switch Toggle) [fullscreen_toggle]
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Stabil Version from the Fullscreen Button.

1.1

  • Added Support for Font Awesome for the Fullscreen Button. Font Awesome Expand Icon as Alternative to the Unicode Symbol. A Second Shortcode is Available. [fullscreen_button_fa]

1.2

  • Added an Alternate Fullscreen Icon. Shortcode: [fullscreen_button_a1]

1.3

  • Added a Text Version of the Fullscreen Button. Shortcode: [fullscreen_button_text]

1.4

  • Added a New Unicode Version of the Fullscreen Button. The Wide-Headed North East Light Barb Arrow and the Up Down Arrow. Shortcodes: [fullscreen_button_2] [fullscreen_button_3]

1.5

  • Added a New Switch Toggle Version of the Fullscreen Button. Shortcode: [fullscreen_toggle]

1.6

  • Added a New Font Awesome Toggle Switch Version of the Fullscreen Button. Shortcode: [fullscreen-btn-fa]

short_description: Fullscreen Button Plugin, with a stylable Unicode Symbol for your WordPress.
